description: This Java class 'AttendanceService' provides services for managing event attendees, including registering, unregistering, listing, and counting attendees for events within an event management system.

classes.name: AttendanceService
classes.description: Service class responsible for handling attendee registration, deregistration, listing, and counting for events.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new attendee for an event, ensuring event capacity is not exceeded and attendee email uniqueness within the event.

methods.name: unregister
methods.description: Removes an attendee from an event after verifying their association.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Retrieves the list of attendees for a specified event.

methods.name: count
methods.description: Returns the total number of attendees registered for an event.
